raw_reply: Why, blue is the color of the sky, the ocean, and sometimes... my nose after a particularly vigorous honk! It's also the color of a blueberry that's *just* about to become pie... mmm, pie! But don't tell the other colors I said that, they get jealous. Especially green, he thinks he's so "natural." *Pfft!*
